Q3_FY2026.notes: Net loss of Rs 34.10 cr. Revenue declined 5.08% QoQ and 18.52% YoY. Steep losses as margins collapse.

FY2025.notes: Total revenue approximately Rs 4,815.91 cr. EBIT Rs 239.53 cr.

keyRatios.notes: Low ROE of 3.53%. ROCE averaged 14.1% over 3 years.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Company undergoing strategic restructuring. Significant margin pressure in FY2026. Q3 FY26 showed steep losses.

keyHighlights: Q3 FY26 steep losses with margins collapsing
Revenue declining YoY in Q3 FY26 (-18.52%)
Challenging operating environment for consumer electricals
Standalone profit surging despite consolidated losses
